title: AI Pet Sequence Builder
description: Help your AI pet complete daily activities by arranging programming blocks in the correct sequence
learningObjectives: Arrange programming blocks in logical sequence
Understand the importance of order in programming
Connect programming sequences to AI behavior
aiConcepts: Smart devices execute commands in order
startingCode:
🎯 Challenge: Help your AI pet get ready for school!

🤖 Available Blocks (drag in correct order):

🟨 [Say "Good morning!"]
🟪 [Change costume to "brushing teeth"]
🟪 [Change costume to "eating breakfast"]
🟪 [Change costume to "getting dressed"]
🟪 [Change costume to "ready for school"]
🟨 [Say "I'm ready for a great day!"]
🎵 [Play sound "happy tune"]

🎯 Your Task:
Drag the blocks below to create the correct morning routine sequence!
solution:
🟦 [When green flag clicked]
🟨 [Say "Good morning!"]
🟪 [Change costume to "getting dressed"]
🟪 [Wait 1 second]
🟪 [Change costume to "brushing teeth"]
🟪 [Wait 1 second]
🟪 [Change costume to "eating breakfast"]
🟪 [Wait 1 second]
🟪 [Change costume to "ready for school"]
🟨 [Say "I'm ready for a great day!"]
🎵 [Play sound "happy tune"]

🤖 AI Connection:
Just like your AI pet follows this sequence, smart home devices follow sequences too:
1. Alarm goes off
2. Lights turn on gradually
3. Coffee maker starts
4. Weather report plays
5. Music begins

tests.description: AI pet says good morning first
tests.hint: What's the first thing you do when you wake up? Your AI pet should greet you!
Think about your real morning routine - do you get dressed before or after eating?

tests.description: Brushing teeth is included in routine
tests.hint: Don't forget about dental hygiene! Where does teeth brushing fit in the morning routine?

tests.description: AI pet ends with positive message
tests.expected: Final blocks show readiness and happiness
tests.hint: How should your AI pet feel when ready for school? End with encouragement!

hints: 🌅 Think about your own morning routine - what order do you do things?
🤖 AI pets need to follow logical sequences just like real pets need routines
⏰ Some activities must happen before others - getting dressed before going outside!
😊 Your AI pet should start and end the day with positive energy
🔄 If something doesn't make sense, try rearranging the blocks

extensions.title: Create Your Own Routine

extensions.title: Weekend vs School Day
extensions.description: Create different sequences for different types of days

extensions.title: AI Pet Emotions
extensions.description: Add emotion blocks that change based on the routine success

realWorldConnections: Smart home systems that automate morning routines
AI assistants that remind you of daily tasks in order
Educational apps that guide students through learning sequences
Robot vacuum cleaners that follow cleaning sequences

assessmentRubric.excellent: Correctly sequences all blocks with logical flow, explains AI connections
assessmentRubric.proficient: Sequences most blocks correctly with minor logical issues
assessmentRubric.developing: Attempts sequencing but has some order problems
assessmentRubric.beginning: Needs significant support to understand sequencing concepts

teacherNotes.preparation: Have physical sequence cards ready for students who need tactile learning
teacherNotes.commonMistakes: Students often put eating before getting dressed - discuss real-world logic
teacherNotes.differentiation: Provide fewer blocks for struggling learners, more complex routines for advanced students
teacherNotes.aiDiscussion: Ask students to identify AI systems they know that follow sequences (Alexa routines, game NPCs, etc.)

vocabulary.sequence: A specific order of steps or actions
vocabulary.algorithm: A set of rules or instructions for solving a problem
vocabulary.logical order: Arranging things in a way that makes sense

parentSupport.homeActivity: Practice giving step-by-step instructions for household chores
parentSupport.discussion: Talk about how smart devices in your home follow sequences (dishwasher cycles, washing machine programs)
parentSupport.extension: Create a family morning routine chart together
